participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and supportive, Emily enjoys sharing her passions with others and has a love for the arts.
participant_1.background: I lie to my children about eating healthy. I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day. I have two dogs, one pitbull and an old English bulldog. I learned piano at age 6. I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and free-spirited, Liam has a vibrant personality and a passion for music and theater.
participant_2.background: I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments. I've never been arrested, but I would love to travel the world and play music like my brother. I have broken my arm twice. I never knew my father, but my mother is always there for me. I am a hippopotamus, and I spend my days swimming in the river, eating plants, and basking in the sun.

content.text: I'm a big fan of theater! What kind of theater do you do?
I've done a little bit of everything, but I mostly do musicals.
That's great! I've always wanted to try out for a musical.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm not sure if I'm good enough, though.
Anyone can be good enough! You just have to have fun with it.
I guess you're right. Maybe I'll give it a try.
No problem! What's your favorite musical?
I think my favorite is Hamilton.
That's a great choice! It's one of my favorites too.
It's so good! The music is amazing and the story is really interesting.
I agree! It's a really well done show.
I'm so glad I got to talk to you about theater!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares my love of theater.
